summary: Completed testing of PGY3-HUB Mind Mapping Tool node persistence fix. CRITICAL ISSUE FOUND: While Cytoscape.js is loading and nodes exist in memory (24 nodes detected), NO NODES ARE VISIBLE on the canvas. The incremental update system appears to be working (console shows proper node processing), but there's a critical rendering/display issue preventing users from seeing any nodes.

ui_bugs.issue: CRITICAL: All nodes invisible - Canvas appears completely blank despite 24 nodes existing in Cytoscape memory
ui_bugs.description: Dashboard loads successfully, Cytoscape initializes with 24 nodes and 7 edges, but no nodes are visible to users. Console shows nodes being processed but canvas remains blank.

ui_bugs.issue: Node rendering failure - nodes exist in memory but not displayed
ui_bugs.error: Nodes processed in console logs but not rendered visually
ui_bugs.description: Console shows extensive node processing (topic-*, case-*, task-*, literature-* IDs) but visual rendering is completely broken

integration_issues.issue: Disconnect between node data processing and visual rendering
integration_issues.description: The incremental update system processes nodes correctly (console shows node IDs and updates) but the visual rendering pipeline is broken

design_issues.issue: Complete loss of visual feedback for users
design_issues.description: Users see a blank canvas with no indication that nodes exist or that the mind mapping functionality is working

passed_tests: Sidebar buttons and controls are visible and functional
Node data processing works (24 nodes, 7 edges detected in memory)
Console shows incremental update system is functioning
No JavaScript runtime errors preventing app loading
action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix node rendering issue in CytoscapeGraph component. Nodes exist in memory (24 nodes detected) and incremental updates are working, but NO NODES ARE VISIBLE on canvas. This completely breaks the user experience. Investigate: 1) Canvas sizing/positioning, 2) Node visibility styles, 3) Cytoscape container setup, 4) HTML label rendering system. The node persistence fix may be working, but it's impossible to test without visible nodes.

success_percentage.frontend: 20% - Dashboard loads but core functionality (node visualization) is completely broken
